org.grouplens.lenskit.config

Class ConfigurationLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.config.ConfigurationLoader

  • public class ConfigurationLoader
extends Object

    Load LensKit configurations using the configuration DSL.

    Since:
    1.2

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ConfigurationLoader()
      Construct a new configuration loader.
      ConfigurationLoader(ClassLoader loader)
      Construct a new configuration loader.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigurationLoader

        public ConfigurationLoader()

        Construct a new configuration loader. It uses the current thread’s class loader.

        Construct a new configuration loader.

      • load

        @Deprecated
public LenskitConfiguration load(@Nonnull
                                   groovy.lang.Closure<?> block)
                          throws RecommenderConfigurationException
        Deprecated. Use ConfigHelpers.load(groovy.lang.Closure) instead.

        Load a configuration from a closure. The class loader is not really consulted in this case.

        Parameters:
        block - The block to evaluate. This block will be evaluated with a delegate providing the LensKit DSL and the Closure.DELEGATE_FIRST resolution strategy.
        Returns:
        The resulting LensKit configuration.
        Throws:
        RecommenderConfigurationException
